channel.title: Need major help!
channel.description:
I NEED MAJOR HELP!!!
Well I posted this 2 yrs ago and no one helped (or at least around 2 yrs ago)
What has happened is, on my computer, around 2 years ago, the first day I downloaded the pimpscape client, I ran it, and since im not that dumb, I got it running online, made some commands and edited the client.java file with ease.
Then around 2 days later, whenever I edited the client.java file, it wouldnt update
Example I add a command for admins that gives ghostly armor, yet it doesnt work in game
What is to my understanding is the client.java file updates the client.class file, and the client.class file is where all your commands and stuff are
But I think what my problem is my client.java file DOESNT update my client.class file
So what I tried earlier today was, I downloaded the source Czar on my other computer, and I have JDK on it aswell BTW, and it still didnt update whenever I made a command
I need help, otherwise, the most importent file for my server will never be updated again...
Well I think you know what I mean
Thanks for your time,
Rslider

item.title: Need major help!
item.dc:creator: @rslider rslider
item.description:
@rslider wrote:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05

Yup its JDK alright

(btw Im proud because that was not copy and pasted)

EDIT: I realized I also have JRE 1.6 update 4 and update 5

EDIT 2: Oh and the envirmental thing, I did it, it changed it so I dont get that “cannot find” error, but I still cant change stuff in my client.java file :mad:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2008, 10:39:43 PM[/size][hr]Well I think I may call it a night

Thanks for your help…hopfully…somehow it will work within the next year

Thanks again

Read full topic

item.title: Need major help!
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13
item.description:
@tuptup13 wrote:

…Are you positive you have JDK? Check your program files under java… It might be JRE and not JDK.

Read full topic

item.title: Need major help!
item.dc:creator: @rslider rslider
item.description:
@rslider wrote:

Still…doesnt…work…

Im probably doing something wrong?

If someone could make me a compiler, or give me a link to one or something, I would be ever so grateful

Read full topic

item.title: Need major help!
item.dc:creator: @Phoenixx Phoenixx
item.description:
@Phoenixx wrote:

@echo off title Java Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

if you have the latest version of JDK use the code above, if not then change it to the version you have.

Read full topic

item.title: Need major help!
item.dc:creator: @rslider rslider
item.description:
@rslider wrote:

Reinstalled, didnt work, Still giving me the “You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates.” Error

I dont know why its not working now, but with that serverfile.bat it does say “Could not find Process: java 'javac ’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.”

So I really dont know anymore

Read full topic

item.description:

ya. And we have changed alot in 2 years.

item.title: Need major help!
item.dc:creator: @rslider rslider
item.description:
@rslider wrote:

kk

BTW Since the perfect complier doesnt work for me anymore, I just use the serverfile.bat and sometimes the runserver.bat

Also, you guys help WAYYY better than 2 years ago…

item.title: Need major help!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Set your environmental variables. Then put this in your compiler

@echo off javac *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need major help!
item.dc:creator: @rslider rslider
item.description:
@rslider wrote:

Compiler broke?whats that mean (Im a noob)

Il reinstall JDK if that helps, I use the perfect compiler but… well now it says I dont have JDK when I do…

It used to say I did

But now It says you must have jdk 1.6 update 2… I have JDK 1.6 i think update 5

EDIT: Ok so reinstall JDK???

:(I HATE INSTALLING AND DOWNLOADING JDK… It keeps downloading with java download manager…Plus it takes FOREVER TO INSTALL)

Read full topic

item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

compiler (javac.exe). Just reinstall jdk.

[quote=“rslider, post:1, topic:196083”]I NEED MAJOR HELP!!!

Well I posted this 2 yrs ago and no one helped (or at least around 2 yrs ago)

What has happened is, on my computer, around 2 years ago, the first day I downloaded the pimpscape client, I ran it, and since im not that dumb, I got it running online, made some commands and edited the client.java file with ease.

Then around 2 days later, whenever I edited the client.java file, it wouldnt update

Example
I add a command for admins that gives ghostly armor, yet it doesnt work in game

What is to my understanding is the client.java file updates the client.class file, and the client.class file is where all your commands and stuff are

But I think what my problem is my client.java file DOESNT update my client.class file

So what I tried earlier today was, I downloaded the source Czar on my other computer, and I have JDK on it aswell BTW, and it still didnt update whenever I made a command

I need help, otherwise, the most importent file for my server will never be updated again…

Well I think you know what I mean

Thanks for your time,

Rslider[/quote]
Your compile broke It has been known to do that. Reinstall JDK.
